name: The Hotel Show Dubai

Economic instability, technological advancements like artificial intelligence and machine learning and geopolitical changes have encouraged businesses to look beyond their traditional boundaries for opportunity and growth.

description: EuroTier the world's leading trade fair for animal production is coming to the Middle East, bringing this global platform to one of the most prominent animal production hubs on the planet. The new show is the ideal platform for agricultural businesses to enter a growing livestock  market and take advantage of the opportunity to help shape the future of animal production in the Middle East. It brings together the farmers, the cooperatives, the experts, the government and the industry all under one roof, leveraging a global platform to respond to local and regional needs. Steel Fab has been identified by the regional industry as the sourcing point for all welding requirements as well. Apart from this, Steel Fab also deals with machine tools and it's manufacturing displaying lathes, milling, drilling, grinding, EDMs, work centers, tool room machinery, high-precision machine tools, machining centers and affiliated machine tools.

description: How To Successfully Drive A Strategy-Led & Technology-Infused Business Enhancement Project To Deliver On The Vast Promise Of Personalised Customer Experiences.

The Conference provides education, best practice and the chance to learn, meet and network with leading laboratorians from across the globe.

Comprised pre-conference courses, exhibition, and conferences. It enjoys the participation of thousands of high-caliber dental professionals and oral health industry specialists, from the region and the world.

name: Dubai World Dermatology and Laser Conference & Exhibition
description: The Dubai World Dermatology and Laser Conference & Exhibition is a unique event that will present a perfect opportunity for all participants to boost and update their knowledge in dermatological science and technology through a variety of courses, workshops, and lectures. This program provides an ideal setting for specialists and practitioners in this field to strengthen existing collaborations and develop new ones with their counterparts from all over the world.
ep: Profile for exhibit include Skin Fillers & Botox, Mesotherapy, Melanocytes Transplant, Phototherapy, Fat Injection etc.

name: Middle East Smart Water Utilities Exhibition and Conference
description: The Middle East Smart Water Utilities 2021 Exhibition & Conference is the only event of its kind to deliver leading market intelligence and industry presentations on the latest in water utilities and smart technological advancements for improving network efficiencies and operations . Welcome to the Middle East Smart Water Utilities 2021 Exhibition and Conference where global water utilities and network services will meet with water leakage experts and smart water technology providers in Abu Dhabi to explore efficient and cost-effective solutions for the water utilities industry. Non-revenue water (NRW) is water that is lost before it reaches end-users, with water leakage being a key contributor of global water loss, currently valued at $40 billion per year, which is now driving the demand for smart technology solutions. The face of water supply networks is fast changing as operators navigate through the ‘digital water age’ and introduce new technologies across their water networks with advances in IoT and AI for network automation and control to efficiently manage and reduce water leakage. As operators work to meet new regulations and leakage targets, new initiatives towards more efficient water networks have become essential in order to satisfy an ever-increasing demand for water. With new developments in smart water technologies and technical know-how, recent advancements in leak detection offer new hope for water companies looking for operational efficiencies under challenging market conditions, and to better manage their water networks.

name: SIAL Middle East

location.name: Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - ADNEC

description: SIAL Middle East is the leading food, beverage, and hospitality event. Bakery & confectionery, dairy & egg products, organic products, seafood products, meat & poultry, and various health products are also showcased at the exhibition.

name: The Big 5

Power Africa Expo take place in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates a hub for cleantech companies and hosts the headquarters of the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) one of the intergovernmental organisation mandated to facilitate cooperation, advance knowledge, and promote the adoption and sustainable use of renewable energy, Power Africa Expo is set to become a key component for Africa’s primary strategy to achieve sustainable development by scaling up and accelerating the deployment and funding of huge energy potential of the continent in a low carbon manner with less vulnerable to climate change underpins the POWER AFRICA EXPO platform which are comprised of large scale exhibitions and conferences

It is the centre of attraction for Muslim buyers, producers, exporters and also the for the industries associated in Halal Packaging and Halal Transportation.

Meet the people who play an important role in making decisions on future investments and the organisations that back the seafood industry.

The wide range of products showcased at Light Middle East is divided into 6 key segments: Decorative lighting and accessories, Electrical and electronic components and accessories for lighting systems, Electric lamps, LED lighting, Technical lighting and accessories and House and Building Automation.

name: Middle East Cleaning Technology Week
description: Now in its 6th edition, Middle East Cleaning Technology Week is the region’s leading platform dedicated to the cleaning and hygiene industries. The show encompasses three trade shows; Clean Middle East Expo will bring together leading global manufacturers and suppliers focused on cleaning and hygiene solutions. Visitors across hospitality, healthcare, catering and logistics as well as cleaning and facilities management contractors can explore the latest innovations. Gulf Laundrex presented by Texcare will showcase technologies across the textile care chain for laundries and dry-cleaners. Gulf Car Wash, the region’s only dedicated event for the car wash and car care sector will present the latest solutions in automotive wash, specifically designed for service centres, workshops, auto-detailing centres and independent car wash operators. A free-to-attend conference will also run in parallel covering three key topics – Facilities Management, Cleaning and Laundry.

name: Forex Expo Dubai
description: The Forex Expo Dubai is designed for the Forex Professionals to learn and Explore in the Fx trading business and this event will provide the attendees with the opportunity to meet the right leaders who can change their life with their knowledge shared to them. description: Seamless is the region's leading payments and commerce technology conference and exhibition. With one shared free-to-attend exhibition hosting 500 of the region's leading technology providers.

name: Expo Dubai
description: Expo 2020 Dubai will host the world for 173 days, each one brimming with new experiences. It’ll be a time to create, collaborate and innovate. We’re talking eye-catching, mind-bending, taste bud-tickling, grin-inducing, good-weird, did-that-really-just-happen fun. Come along, or spend a lifetime telling less interesting stories. Created by the 1928 Paris Convention, the Bureau International des Expositions (BIE) is the Paris-based intergovernmental organisation in charge of overseeing and regulating World Expos.

location.name: Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - ADNEC

description: Abu Dhabi International Hunting and Equestrian Exhibition (ADIHEX) is considered to be the most popular exhibition of hunting, equestrian and heritage conservation. ADIHEX is a government initiative that aims primarily to promote Sustainable Hunting, Environmental and Cultural heritage. name: TECHSPO Dubai
description: TECHSPO Dubai is a two-day technology expo returning October 12th to 13th, 2021 to the luxurious 5-star Hyatt Regency Dubai Hotel in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. TECHSPO Dubai brings together developers, brands, marketers, technology providers, designers, innovators and evangelists looking to set the pace in our advanced world of technology. Showcasing the next generation of technology & innovation; Internet, Mobile, AdTech, MarTech & SaaS Technology, Exhibitors have the opportunity to show off their companies to consumers, the highest caliber investors, hordes of press, the most sought after talent, and the greatest pool of tech enthusiasts looking to celebrate emerging products. Be prepared to be inspired, amazed and educated on how these evolving technologies will impact your business for greater growth. TECHSPO Dubai 2021 will play host to some of the finest innovators, entrepreneurs, founders and business owners. Educators, students, investors, senior marketers and branders, digital executives and professionals, web & mobile application developers, strategists, designers and web project managers, business leaders, business developers, thought leaders and other professionals like you who operate in the broad technology industry from around the world will gather to attend TECHSPO Dubai Technology Expo.

In fact, it is the ideal platform for exhibitors including Mattress Manufacturers, Mattress Machinery, Sleep technology & Accessories, Bed Linen, and Sleeping Aids suppliers and distributors from the international sectors to showcase their products, innovations, and solutions to the growing market.The 3rd edition of the Sleep Expo is bigger and better! name: UTECH Middle East Foam and Polyurethane Expo
description: UTECH Middle East Foam and Polyurethane Expo is the region’s only dedicated technical foam and polyurethane exhibition and conference organised by Media Fusion and Crain Communication's Global Polymer Group, the organisers of PU China, UTECH Asia, UTECH Europe, UTECH Las Americas and UTECH North America. This 3 day trade show will focus on the latest developments in the foam and polyurethane industry and will serve as an ideal platform for exhibitors and visitors including manufacturers, suppliers and buyers of technical foam materials, products, technologies and services, and all other segments of the polyurethane industry, from the international arena to showcase their products, solutions and innovations in a dynamic market. The conference, that runs alongside the trade show, will witness focused discussions with international subject matter experts from the foam and PU industry sharing information and insights on the current market scenario, emerging trends and challenges.

location.name: Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - ADNEC

The exhibition brought together more than 15,000 visitors from Emirati young graduates and experienced professionals seeking new job opportunities in various fields. A number of institutions in the governmental and private sectors participated in the exhibition this year including the Edge Group of Companies.
ep: Tawdheef(The Recruitment Show Abu Dhabi) will be host to exhibitors from the sectors of telecom, IT, media, event management, investment, transport, logistics, trade, retail, wholesale, tourism, health and insurance, energy, oil and gas, defense, safety and security, government and social services, banks and financial institutions, recruitment, consultancy, industries, manufacturing and maintenances. Particular attention will be paid to emerging challenges such readying road infrastructure to autonomous vehicles, advanced travel demand management, safety of vulnerable road users, and energy-efficient infrastructure, to name a few.

Through an extensive programme of B2B meetings, networking events, talks and installations, downtown Design provides an excellent platform for business development in the Middle East.

Trans Health brings perfect networking platform for experts to share their latest research and advancements in Transgender Health and associated fields. Trans Health will cover important, burning and cutting-edge topics. We are anticipating participants including Speakers, Students and Delegates across the globe to attend the conference.

name: International Conference & Expo on Pediatrics and Neonatology
description: Coalesce Research Group proudly announces the “International Conference & Expo on Pediatrics and Neonatology” to be held on November 15-16, 2021 in Dubai, UAE with the theme “Advances in Pediatric and Neonatal Care”. This would be the best platform for the all the medical researchers to share and gain the knowledge on current emerging trends of pediatrics. This 2-day event is designed in such a way that it focuses on a spectrum of researches both in Neonatology and Pediatrics. The conference comprises of Keynote lectures, Workshops, Symposia, Speaker talks, Exhibitions, Poster Presentations and B2B meetings. About Coalesce Research Group: It is an USA based emerging open access publisher and International Conference Event organizer which owe to serve the scientific community by serving the high quality genuine research work from eminent scientists, professors, scientific research communities in all fields of medicine, clinical, life science, engineering and technology.

name: ARABLAB
description: ARABLAB is a promising event where science and innovation converge and make way for something technological miracle to happen. The world of science comes to life at this exposition, and many countries and international players show a keen interest in this event.

description: The Mining Show has proved to be an unmissable event for industry professionals each year, delivering a huge agenda focused on the most pressing issues and trends of today and is firmly established as the largest mining and quarrying event for the Middle East, Africa, Central Asia and South Asia.

name: Dubai Airshow
description: The Dubai Airshow is one of the largest and most successful air shows in the world, connecting aerospace professionals across all areas of the industry to facilitate successful global trade. Dubai is continuing to grow and outpace traditional markets as it becomes an increasingly important global aerospace hub. Exhibitors and visitors attend the Dubai Airshow to take advantage of this growth and build their brand.

name: ArabPlast
description: ArabPlast, the largest trade expo for plastics, petrochemicals and rubber industry in the Mena region, is set to bring together key players and experts in the sector from around the world in Dubai. The trade expo shall showcase innovative ideas, technologies and new products in the widespread sectors of plastics, petrochemicals and rubber viz. plastic machinery, plastic/rubber processing technology, pre and post-processing systems, plastic packaging technology, injection moulding, blow moulding, wrapping technology, extrusions, chemicals and additives, semi-finished goods, engineering plastics and plastic products, and more.

name: Dental Facial Cosmetic Conference & Exhibition

address.streetAddress: Madinat Jumeirah, Al Sufouh Road - Dubai

description: The 12th Dental Facial Cosmetic Conference & Exhibition will cover areas like modern technologies and fast-growing evolving of the materials and techniques, cosmetic treatment from teeth whitening, laser procedures, composite fillings, dental bonding to veneers and dental implants, cosmetic dentistry, and much more. Aptly timed to coincide with EXPO 2021, it will be merged with 15th CAD/CAM & Digital Dentistry Conference & Exhibition under one big event CAPP DENTAL CONFEXPO.

name: Stamegna Network - Middle East Health & Beauty Care
description: Cut the customer chasing process out of your business: Stamegna helps you make the best of your time by decreasing your management time and your costs while guaranteeing well organised meetings with qualified companies. Middle-East beauty retail chains, drugstores and distributors will be joining the the event from various countries to have 30 min one on one meetings with suppliers to source new brands, review innovative products and find new vendors for the upcoming season. Vendors have their own display area in the hotel to present products and network with buyers. All the meeting are pre-scheduled and based on companies' preferences. Moreover, you know the exact quantity of samples and catalogues you need to bring. The event is not open for the public and has a focused business format different from any trade show. Meetings are created to boost your export sales in one day.

name: Stamegna Network -  Middle -  East Food & Beverages
description: The event is organized as personal face-to-face business meetings between buyers (retailers, distributors, and importers) and sellers where every supplier has personalized pre-arranged meetings. The timetable is customized by our team based on your interest, categories match, priorities and preferences.

name: Middle East's Festival for Flowers, Plants and Technology
description: International Plants Expo Middle East will be reflecting the huge progress of the trade of horticulture all over the Middle East and proved the position of IPM DUBAI as the prime trade fair for horticultural industry in the region as well as strengthen the Emirate of Dubai as an important destination and a worldwide trading center for this industry.

name: Middle East's Festival for Fruits and Vegetables
description: WOP DUBAI is the only event of its kind dedicated to the region's fresh produce industry. The edition of the exhibition is expected to attract more participants from 35 countries around the world, in addition to experts and specialists in the field of fresh produce, safety and trade of fresh food, technical equipment, transport and logistics. The exhibition also aims to highlight the important role of Dubai Municipality in promoting trade exchange through the Dubai Central Market for Vegetables and Fruits, which is the most popular market for fruits and vegetables in Dubai.

name: VIV MEA

location.name: Abu Dhabi National Exhibition Centre - ADNEC

description: VIV MEA is an international trade show from feed to food which focuses on yield, quality, hygiene, traceability, portioning, performance, profitability, efficiency, transparency, and much more.

name: Access Abilities Expo

organizer.name: Nadd Al Shiba PR and Event Management

description: AccessAbilities Expo is the region's premier trade, professional and consumer event aimed at enhancing the lives of people with disabilities. The event aims to provide a single platform for the entire business and civil community in the Middle East, their families and caregivers, governments and leading international technology vendors.
organizer_name: Nadd Al Shiba PR and Event Management

name: Dubai International Content Market
description: Dubai International Content Market offers global and regional media and entertainment companies the opportunity to expand their business, showcase new content and services, meet with key end-users and buyers, develop partnerships and increase visibility and sales within the Middle-East, Africa and beyond.

name: Paper Arabia
description: Paper Arabia is the gateway and perfect platform for each and everybody in the Paper Technology business, to meet one on one and face to face and offering opportunities to source information, discuss and negotiate their business with the manufacturers of Paper and allied products, Tissue, Raw material and Machinery for the manufacture of paper and board, Mills owners, Converting, Paper Machinery, Corrugated production line suppliers and professionals and view their products on display, first hand at the exhibition.

name: Middle East Organic and Natural Product Expo - Dubai

organizer.name: GLOBAL LINKS EXHIBITIONS & CONFERENCES ORGANISERS PTY LTD

description: The Middle East Natural and Organic Products Expo is all set to return with its 19th edition to Dubai World Trade Centre this December. The expo is the only platform in the regions to connect organic & natural producers, manufacturers, and suppliers to buyers in the regions, focusing on meeting the demands of the billion-dollar market. In 2020, the expo is all set to feature nearly 3500 products of 275 suppliers, with a diverse lineup of exhibitors from 65 countries in categories - F&B, Health, Beauty, Environment and Living.  Watch the live demonstration of organic ingredients come to life in the hands of trained chefs making it an educational extravaganza for all our visitors.  Alongside the expo, the event will also showcase two co-located events for Tea & Coffee and TCAM. Lastly, the Organic Conference, a 2-day conference with some of the eminent buyers and ministries in the Middle East enlightening the industry with some stimulating insights.
organizer_name: GLOBAL LINKS EXHIBITIONS & CONFERENCES ORGANISERS PTY LTD

name: Gulf Traffic
description: Gulf Traffic event is the platform where a wide range of issues related to road safety, infrastructure and parking options are discussed in detail. With a heavy focus from the governments and contractors on incorporating new and innovative methods to control the traffic flow, Gulf Traffic provides you with an ideal platform to network with a niche and high-value set of potential clientele from all over the region.

name: TCAM Conference & Expo

organizer.name: GLOBAL LINKS EXHIBITIONS & CONFERENCES ORGANISERS PTY LTD

description: Organic Tea & Coffee Expo host an exclusive pavilion for tea and growers manufactures and boards to showcase their products and with wholesalers, re-ex-porters, importers, blenders and retailers who are looking to source these products in the MENA region.
organizer_name: GLOBAL LINKS EXHIBITIONS & CONFERENCES ORGANISERS PTY LTD

name: Europe Abu Dhabi
description: This event showcases products like developing capital, business, networking, technology, marketing etc. in the Business Services, Industrial Products industries.

name: IFES Expo
description: The IFES Expo is themed as Connecting Minds, Creating the Future and this event intends to build partnerships and inspire ideas that will forge the world of tomorrow.

name: Beverage and Tobacco Middle East,  Dubai

address.streetAddress: Exit No 13 - شارع الشيخ زايد - Dubai - United Arab Emirates

description: Concepts Group of Companies is operating for the past 20 years both locally and internationally, specializing in the exhibition stand design and build business. This exhibition combines the best of both industry players under one roof. A beach Venue and open environment would make you feel pleasant while doing business with the top players of both industries. Dubai, the gateway to the Middle East and North Africa has been Focused market for this show in which we would like to invite traders, distributors and manufacturers to grab opportunities in this growing economies.

name: IADC Drilling Middle East Conference & Exhibition

address.streetAddress: Sheikh Rashid Bin Saeed Street - Abu Dhabi

description: The 2021 IADC Drilling Middle East Conference & Exhibition will bring together industry leaders and drilling professionals to discuss such challenges and share best practices. This is for subscribing to the events in the Calendar. Add this URL to either iCal (Mac) or Google Calendar, or any other calendar that supports iCal Feed. The International Association of Drilling Contractors (IADC) is a non-profit organization. Income from this event will be invested back into other IADC initiatives we develop to serve the drilling industry to connect, share knowledge, tackle common problems and develop solutions to critical issues in different parts of the world. By participating in an IADC event you will be improving and supporting your own industry. To avoid being a victim of fraud, please do not give out your credit card details to any other party and be sure to make your hotel reservations exclusively through the contracted hotel.

name: GULF PRINT & PACK
description: Gulf Print & Pack is the leading print technology sourcing show for commercial, labels and package print service providers from across the Middle East and Africa. The previous edition attracted 8,737 visitors from 90 countries, who came to see over 250 exhibitors occupy more than 12000+ Sqm of space across 3 halls.
